Title: A Final Fantasy XIV Adventure: Stormblood
Credits: Created by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu)., modifed by Raul Mojarro

Kresge.Body: This is Kresge College, lots of nice trees.

Intro.Body: You wake in an unfamiliar place with the sun blinding your eyes.

Azim Steppe.Body: Vast plains span as far as the eye can see! You spy an large structure in the distance, some steep mountains, and what could be a settlement far away.

Dhoro Iloh.Body: At the summit, you encounter a small festival populated by a strange race of catfish-like beings called Namazu.

Choices.Text: Approach the Namzu selling familiar looking weapons

NamazuNPC.Body: "Enjoying our festival? Hope you're not too hungry, afraid some of my glutonous brothers ate too much so we're short on fish"

NamazuA.Body: "Care to buy of these weapons, yes yes?"

NamazuB.Body: "Oh, I cannot part with these weapons for you. I am in need of food and lack the funds, yes yes."

Dawn Throne Base.Body: A strange castle like structure looms before you, surrounded by a lake. You have to climb a chain to enter it

Lake.Body: You find an abandoned fishing pole lying in front of the water.

Choices.Text: Return to the front of the castle

Dawn Throne Interior.Body: You enter a decorated throne room lined with weapons and statues

Choices.Text: Speak with the fierce warrior sitting upon the throne

MagnaiA.Body: "Afraid I'm not in the mood to aid you. Begone"

Choices.Text: What if I offer up my Namazu companion as a humble sacrafice? I've heard they're quite tasty

Attendent.Body: "I'm afraid Magnai is in a bit of foul mood after being tunred down yet again. Perhaps try lifing his spirits? I know he hates Namazu"

Reunion.Body: A small trade outpost filled with merchants. You see a path leading south out of the valley.

Choices.Text: Speak with the important lookin elder

Elder.Body: "Hello again, traveller. What's that, you don't remember anything? I guess that fearsome monster you were tasked with slaying must have hit you hard. 	Hope you're better prepared this time."

Battle0.Body: As you travel down the path, you see a fearsome Rathalos swoop down before you!

Choices.Text: You aren't prepared enough, retreat back to safety!

Battle1.Body: Magnai charges forward with his axe and draws the beast's aggro, while the Namazu attempts to pierce its hide with a flurry of Triple Trident strikes!

Choices.Text: Get a running start with your dual blades drawn

Battle2a.Body: You unleash the full power of Flare, defeating the foe!

Battle2b.Body: You leap into the air and drive both of your blades into the beast's skull as you dive back down! It is slain!

Ending.Body: You bid farewll to your companions and prepare for the Dawntrail expansion. The End
